subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen’s 3-pointer with 2.0 seconds remaining propelled the Celtics to a 118-115 win over the Bulls in Game 2 of the first-round series.
snippet: Ray Allen’s 3-pointer with 2.0 seconds remaining propelled the Celtics to a 118-115 win over the Bulls in Game 2 of the first-round series.
